name: Electrical Mayhem: Hotwire - The Series
description:
Meet Dingus the Duppet. He's an electrician that needs your help to power the six elevators that lead to the exit of the power plant. Rearrange the wires of the many machines to clear a path for Dingus so he can head home and enjoy his peanut butter and jelly sandwich!

Note: Ports not directly attached to machines or batteries don't do anything. Use them as temporary holding spots for wires.

There were some mind-melting bugs with the wire system, so pardon my dust.

Troubleshooting

- Power not working as it should: Try unplugging it and plugging it back in on either end. If that doesn't work, try the other end or reload the level or game.

- Other issues (including being stuck or E not showing up): Refresh the page to reload the game.

Controls

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys

Rearrange Wires - E to plug/unplug a wire

Pause/Restart - Esc

Warning: Beware of short circuits.
